issue.title: [CF 98] Restart wow for 3.0.1a to work completely ?
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.104, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7600.0

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 3.0.1a

Description

Keeps asking me to restart wow when I log in to enable the addon completely. No matter how much I restart, it persists.

Steps to Reproduce

I log in with the addon enabled.

Installed Addons

Ace3 - Release-r981 Ackis Recipe List - 2.1.0 Altoholic - Altoholic 4.0.005 Aperture - Aperture-r74263.3 Archy - Archaeology Assistant - 1.6.3 Auctioneer - Auctioneer Suite 5.9.4961 AutoProfitX - r70 Bagnon - 2.14.0b (No Guild Bank) Bartender4 - 4.4.15 CurseProfiler 2.0 - v47 Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.71-r5040 FuBar - GuildFu - 2.4.4 - r117 FuBar 3.6 - v3.6.7 FuBar_ClockFu - v3.2.0.0 FuBar_DurabilityFu - v2.12 FuBar_ExperienceFu - FuBar_ExperienceFu-r73249.12 FuBar_LocationFu - r140-stable FuBar_MoneyFu - v1.2.4 Gatherer - 3.2.3 GatherMate2 - 1.12 GatherMate2_Data - v2.9 Grid - 1.40000.1403 GridManaBars - v1.03 GridStatusHots - 3.32 GridStatusRaidDebuff - r290 Gryphons Remover - r3 LibRock-1.0 - WoW-3.0-release-3 Mapster - 1.4.0 MoveAnything - 11.4.5 Omen Threat Meter - v3.1.0 OmniCC - 4.0.waffles11 OmniCC Pulse - 1.1.2 Parrot - v1.10.23 PitBull Unit Frames 4.0 - v4.0.0-beta19 Postal - v3.4.5 Power Auras Classic - 4.9 Prat 3.0 - 3.4.15 Prospect - v201101240231 qGlyphFix - qGlyphFix Recount - v4.0.1e release SatrinaBuffFrame - 3.2.3 ShieldsUp - 4.0.3.105 TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 3.0.1a TipTac - 10.12.06 TipTacTalents - 10.10.27 TomTom - v40000-1.0.9 VisualHeal - 11.0 YouArentInAPartyFix - r8
